briefTitle: Special Drug Use Surveillance of Leuplin PRO for Injection Kit 22.5 mg for "Prostate Cancer"
officialTitle: Special Drug Use Surveillance of Leuplin PRO for Injection Kit 22.5 mg for "Prostate Cancer"

eligibilityCriteria.criteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Participants with prostate cancer will be included.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Participants with previous history of hypersensitivity to any of the ingredients of the drug or synthetic LH-RH or LH-RH derivatives

primary.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Had One or More Adverse Events

secondary.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Had One or More Adverse Reactions
secondary.description: Adverse drug reaction refers to adverse events related to the administered drug.
